Key Match Events: The match was abandoned due to rain after 10 overs of play
Scotland scored 90 runs in their 10-over innings
England's bowlers got the game underway but faced a second rain delay
The game was reduced to ten overs per side due to rain
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland won the toss and chose to bat first
A brief rain delay delayed the start by 30 minutes
A no-ball reprieve was given to George Munsey
Post-Match Reflections: Scotland were disappointed with the result
England's record of not beating European sides in T20 World Cups continued
Miscellaneous Highlights: The official ICC anthem 'Out of this World' was played
Scotland's George Munsey hit a reverse hit into the stands
The match was Scotland's first T20I against England
The game was the first Group B clash of the tournament
